name: Ad Abyssum
description:
Save the World, or Die in it.

Scour your way through the deepest depths of the earth to purge the decrepit Underdark of its inhuman nature.

Along the way, pilfer powerful weapons and artifacts, slay beast after beast and become the hero you were destined to be... or die trying.

Made in ~1 month for Marathon Jam 2022.

https://itch.io/jam/marathon-jam-2022-by-solodevelopment

Note: This game is still under development, but is mostly playable (when it wants to be), if any bugs or balance issues are encountered, please use this form to report them:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1XbZbaIcYZ7i6OknOuUIMQYXexDET22qIGOuuvdXsR-o/edi...
